overview: Anne Marie finds her coworker working late and daydreaming on the job. She might just turn his dreams into a reality. Madison gets caught showing off her privates and wants to make sure the evidence doesn't leave the room. Secretary Bobbi Starr is shocked to find that her coworker has been sleeping at the office after his divorce. A coworker turns to Jynx for some serious help. Will she lend a helping hand or expose his secret. April is fed up with her boss's antics and the only way to get things done is to take matters into her own hands.
title: Office Perverts 6
